title: The Flame that freezes
brief_description: The manufacture of Electrolux absorption-type refrigerators in the company’s Melbourne factory. Compares old methods of food preservation with those using refrigeration principles. Shows the manufacture of the freezing unit and explains how it operates. Diagrams explain the operation of refrigerators using gas, kerosene and electricity. Summarises the uses of refrigeration in medical services in both city and country.
